projects.title: DOW 30 Enterprise Conversions
projects.challenge: Convert highly scrutinized, risk-averse enterprise organizations from competitive solutions to McAfee/SentinelOne security platforms.
approach: Deep technical discovery across security, compliance, and IT operations teams
Multi-stakeholder engagement (CISO, CTO, security architects, compliance)
Comprehensive POC design addressing specific enterprise requirements
Competitive technical differentiation and risk mitigation
Executive-level business case development and presentation
outcomes: 3 successful DOW 30 conversions from competitive platforms
Multi-year enterprise agreements secured
Expanded relationships leading to additional product adoption
Reference accounts for future enterprise pursuits

projects.title: $50M Annual Regional Revenue Management
projects.challenge: Manage and grow a portfolio of major enterprise accounts representing $50M in annual revenue, ensuring technical satisfaction, retention, and expansion.
approach: Quarterly business reviews with executive stakeholders
Proactive technical consultation and architecture optimization
Expansion opportunity identification and POC execution
Product feedback loops to engineering teams
Technical issue escalation and resolution coordination
outcomes: $50M annual regional revenue managed successfully
High customer retention and satisfaction
Consistent year-over-year expansion revenue
Strategic account partnerships maintained over multiple years

projects.title: 500K+ Endpoint Enterprise Security Deployment
projects.challenge: Design and support security architecture for the largest customer deployment (500K+ endpoints), ensuring scalability, performance, and operational efficiency.
approach: Architecture design for extreme-scale endpoint security
Performance testing and optimization
Phased deployment strategy across global infrastructure
Operations team training and enablement
Ongoing technical consultation and optimization
outcomes: Successful deployment across 500,000+ endpoints
Maintained performance and stability at enterprise scale
Operational efficiency for security operations team
Blueprint for future large-scale deployments

projects.title: Conference Speaking & Thought Leadership
projects.challenge: Deliver technical sessions that engage and educate diverse audiences (CISOs, security architects, technical practitioners) on complex security topics.
approach: Research-based content development on emerging threats and solutions
Accessible technical communication for mixed audiences
Live demonstrations and practical examples
Interactive Q&A and real-world case studies
Feedback incorporation for continuous improvement
outcomes: Highest-attended sessions outside keynotes at McAfee conferences
Consistent top-rated speaker evaluations
Increased customer engagement and product interest
Recognition as subject matter expert and thought leader

projects.title: Technical White Papers & Documentation
projects.scope: Multiple technical white papers and documentation projects
projects.challenge: Create clear, actionable technical documentation that helps customers and prospects understand complex security concepts and implementation strategies.
approach: Audience analysis to determine appropriate technical depth
Research and synthesis of technical concepts
Clear writing with practical examples and use cases
Peer review and technical accuracy validation
Customer feedback integration
outcomes: Widely-used technical documentation across customer base
Improved customer understanding of product capabilities
Sales enablement through clear technical communication
Recognition for technical writing quality

projects.title: Product Feedback & Innovation
projects.scope: Ongoing product feedback and feature requests
projects.challenge: Translate customer needs and field experience into actionable product feedback that drives meaningful improvements.
approach: Systematic customer feedback collection during POCs and deployments
Technical analysis of feature gaps and usability issues
Detailed feature requests with business justification
Collaboration with product management and engineering teams
Validation of implemented features with customers
outcomes: Multiple product improvements implemented based on feedback
Enhanced product-market fit for enterprise customers
Improved customer satisfaction and retention
Recognition as trusted field advisor to product teams

metrics.relationship: Trusted field advisor to product teams
